parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game5</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version5</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game6</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version6</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Removes all magazines of given type from the unit. If magazine class does not exist, nothing happens, not even .rpt message, unlike with [[addMagazine]] command.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> unitName '''removeMagazines''' magazineName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[removeMagazines]] "30Rnd_556x45_Stanag";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazine]], [[magazines]], [[removeMagazine]], [[removeWeapon]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[setVehicleAmmo]]
</value></part></template>


<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">[[User:pyro05x|pyro05x]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Though BIS did not provide a command to remove '''all''' magazines of every type, it can still be accomplished using [[forEach]] [[magazines]]. example:
<ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>{player removeMagazine _x} forEach magazines player</inner><close></pre></close></ext>
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
